COME ON YOU SPURS





Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
Capacity 62,062
Opened 3 April 2019

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZtPVnTAh3s




熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會主場為熱刺球場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」


榮譽：

甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984

乙組聯賽 冠軍：1919/1920, 1949/1950
慈善盾 冠軍：1920/1921, 1951/1952, 1961/1962, 1962/1963, 1967/1968 (joint), 1981/1982 (joint), 1991/1992 (joint)
南部聯賽 冠軍：1899/1900
西部聯賽 冠軍： 1903/1904
倫敦超級聯賽 冠軍：1902/1903
南方聯賽C組 冠軍： 1939/1940
南部聯賽 冠軍： 1943/1944, 1944/1945
南區慈善盃 冠軍: 1901/1902, 1904/1905 (joint), 1906/1907
Dewar盾 冠軍：1901/1902, 1933/1934
倫敦挑戰盃 冠軍：1910/1911, 1928/1929Anglo-意大利聯賽盃冠軍 冠軍： 1971/1972
諾域治慈善盃 冠軍： 1919/1920
諾域治醫院慈善盃 冠軍： 1946/1947, 1949/1950 (joint)
葉士域治醫院慈善盃 冠軍： 1951/1952 (joint)
Costa Del Sol 巡迴賽 冠軍：1965, 1966
Nolia 盃 (瑞典) 冠軍: 1977
日本盃 冠軍：1979
太陽國際挑戰盃 (瑞士) 冠軍：1983
和平盃 (韓國) 冠軍: 2005
Vodacom 挑戰賽 (南非) 冠軍: 2007

巴克萊亞洲盃：2009

國際冠軍盃 冠軍：2018

開始好多外國球評家都估計
摩佬有機會放Foyth 打防中。

Foyth is a centre-back for his club and a right-back for his country and he has an all round skill set for a young defender.

He can head, he can tackle, he has just enough of a turn of pace to keep up with most attackers, but allied to that he's incredibly comfortable on the ball and he can dribble or pass his way out of the tightest of situations.

That description either fits a Rio Ferdinand-esque defender or it sums up the best kind of defensive midfielders.

Foyth has experience in the centre of the park. He told football.london last year that he was a midfielder until as late as 16-years-old in Estudiantes' academy and an attacking one to boot before spending a short spell in the anchorman role.

"I started playing as an attacking midfielder but as time went by I grew taller, because I had been quite short, and maybe I lost a bit of the dribbling ability I had, and that’s why gradually I was moved to a defensive midfielder and then I ended up as a central defender when I was 16. It's late no?" he asked.

"I started playing as an attacking midfielder but as time went by I grew taller, because I had been quite short, and maybe I lost a bit of the dribbling ability I had, and that’s why gradually I was moved to a defensive midfielder and then I ended up as a central defender when I was 16. It's late no?" he asked.
